isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14618 AND RTLO-16618 SERIES - AIR SYSTEM - INSERT VALVE

svcproc.title: INSERT VALVE
svcproc.para: The insert valve is a self-contained 1-3/16 inch valve assembly located in the splitter cylinder cover. It CANNOT be disassembled except for the three O-rings on the outer diameter. The O-rings provide a stationary seal and do not move in cylinder.

When installing the insert valve in the bottom edge of cover, apply Fuller #71206 silicone lubricant or its equivalent to O-rings and cylinder walls. Install valve in bore with flat surface to the outside. When installing the special valve retaining nut, apply Fuller #71204 adhesive/sealant or Loctite 242 to threads and tighten. Refer to the TORQUE CHART
.
